title: Donut Time
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Honoka-chan. Here you go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wow, donuts! They look delicious! Thanks, Kanata-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Youâ€™re welcome. Iâ€™d love to hear what you think after youâ€™ve tasted them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course, no problem! Donâ€™t mind if I do~! Nom... Yum, this is so tasty~~! This has such a mochi-like, springy texture!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I put mochi into the batter. There was mochi left over from New Yearâ€™s, so I came up with some ways to use them in other recipes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I see. I never considered putting mochi into donuts. Honoka-chan, why donâ€™t we have some tea with our donuts?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Sure!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, letâ€™s head to the club room.
